pageContext.claim: “Brilliant Constitutional Lawyer, Dr. John Eastman, said the Special Prosecutor (Mueller) should have NEVER been appointed in the first place. The entire exercise was fundamentally illegal. The Witch Hunt should never happen to another President of the U.S. again. A TOTAL SCAM!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims that the Russia investigation had an "illegal" origin. But his own appointee, Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein, authorized the special counsel investigation and selected Robert Mueller to lead it. Multiple judges upheld Mueller's appointment.
